MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin, affecting properties in Llanfair Dyffryn Clwyd and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected. Our emergency response team have managed to restore supply to a number of properties and after carrying out line patrols and placing fault finding equipment have confirmed the fault has been caused by a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:06AM on 5TH November 2020.
